data: Senior Flutter Engineer with 3+ years of production experience architecting high-performance, cross-platform applications across Real Estate, E-commerce, and AI sectors. Expert in Clean Architecture and BLoC, with a proven track record of optimizing app launch times by 90%+ and slashing operational API costs by 85%. Active open-source contributor and package author, dedicated to building scalable, offline-first mobile solutions and mentoring through technical engineering content.
